faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How do I change my subscription plan?
faq.a1: Go to Settings > Subscription to view and change your current plan. You can upgrade or downgrade at any time.
faq.q2: How do I download content for offline viewing?
faq.a2: Tap the download icon on any content to save it for offline viewing. Downloads are available on mobile devices only.
faq.a3: Check your internet connection. If the problem persists, try clearing the app cache or restarting the app.
faq.q4: How do I cancel my subscription?
faq.a4: You can cancel your subscription anytime through Settings > Subscription > Cancel Plan. You'll continue to have access until the end of your billing period.
